sentences.en: All rising to great place is by a winding stair.
sentences.cn: 凡取得成功的人都走过一段艰难曲折的道路.

sentences.en: Clutch stair armrest, move carefully step by step.
sentences.cn: 抓紧楼梯扶手, 一步步谨慎地移动.

sentences.en: Do you know what we used to call that squeaky stair?
sentences.cn: 你知道我们把那个嘎吱响的叫做什么 吗 ?

sentences.en: He constantly listened, expecting to hear her foot on the stair.
sentences.cn: 他一直竖起耳朵听着, 期待着听到楼梯上传来她的脚步声.

sentences.en: He heard soft footsteps coming up the stair.
sentences.cn: 他听见有人上楼的轻微脚步声.

sentences.en: He was in agony when he descended a crowded stair.
sentences.cn: 最使他急得无法可施的是在人丛中走下楼的时候.

sentences.en: His office is down the stair.
I followed her down the stair.
I recognized the blank , resentful stair of incomprehension in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 我在她的眼睛里看到一种茫然的 、 忿恨的难以理解的眼光.

sentences.en: Loading dock. Stair , ladder, and dock leveler can be shown or hidden.
sentences.cn: 装卸口. 可显示或隐藏楼梯 、 扶梯和装卸台.

sentences.en: Subsequent work has more than tripled the capacity to store charge in the STAIR cell.
sentences.cn: 后续工作将实现在STAIR电池中储存三倍的电量.

sentences.en: Terry was sitting on the bottom stair.
sentences.cn: 特里正坐在最下面的一级楼梯上。

sentences.en: The child was sitting on the bottom stair.
sentences.cn: 那孩子正坐在楼梯最下面的一级上.

sentences.en: The STAIR ( St Andrews Air ) cell should be cheaper than today's rechargeable s, too.
sentences.cn: 而且,STAIR电池的价格比起现在的可充电电池应当更为低廉.

sentences.en: The stair treads were covered with rubber to prevent slipping.
sentences.cn: 楼梯踏板上覆盖着橡胶以防滑.

sentences.en: We walked up four flights of stairs (= sets of stairs ) .
sentences.cn: 我们往上走了四段楼梯。

trans.tran_en: a set of steps built for going from one level of a building to another
